pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 9, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 9, 2016:

Angus, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Canadian Forces Base Borden Centennial.

Angus Recreation Centre
8527 County Rd.10,
Angus, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Media are asked to confirm their attendance with Captain Rob Bungay, Public Affairs Officer, Canadian Forces Base Borden: 705-730-8957, Rob.Bungay@forces.gc.ca


Ottawa, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Global Heads of Mission meeting.

Closed to media.

Media appearance

10:00 a.m. â€“ An interview with the Prime Minister will air on the Business News Network.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
